Blog.post: Oh my...suppose to go out this afternoon. A week has passed but the scenario is still there. A grammy award for suria has been telecast a live on 14 may.what a great day! I feel so happy cos my idol has win a award this year. After 7 years,can you imagine that,oh gosh! Next week,he is going to beijing for 5 days. Gonna miss him!hehehe!i wonder what he is doing now....
The weather for these past few days are unbearable! Very hot!Today as usual,nothing to do at home, so bored.Wanna go out tomorrow to buy groceries...
Oh my gosh!this is my first time doing my blog.... Wonder what is good about it.Well,just for fun! Today iam off untill friday,so nice.. But i feel sick today,better take good rest...

I feel terrible since yesterday.No wonder i feel that way cos he will be away for kl tommorrow.Lately he received a lot of project and accept halve of it.He only be back on 10 july and going back again to Kl.So sad!but at the the same time,i wish him all the best and happy for him.gonna met him on 10 july.Miz him so much....

Went out with my freinds just now,had some kinda of fun,we go for a karaoke's club and went for a dinner.Oh no!im having a menses and before i knew it,its there. Guess what,i didnt bring along the pads.yucks!lucky,it is not kinda of heavy...

CB1 is a nice malay drama and the casting are not bad. one of the cast,julia is just like me,who is idolise her idol too much, and the CB2 isnt that good compare to CB1.One of the cast,farhana is daring to say "i love you"to the person she loves.She is lucky cos the guy finally admit that he like her too.Lucky her!How i wish to be like her,i mean her brave and her luck.Anyway,it is just a plain drama,the drama should have 16 episod but have to cut down to 14.
I wonder wether he has someone or not. Whenever i think about it,im so confused.. Help me!But so far he never mentioned...why!

Yesterday was a father's day.We celebrated outside,to have a dinner together. regretted not order nasi lemak or mutton chop intead i order mutton steak.Yucks! too much salted....anyway its urlLink free ....father pay the urlLink food .I shouldsay thank you instead complaining,right?
Thanks to my sis for doing all this in one sec. These past few days,i feeling sick. yesterday,i just went to see a doc. oh gosh!i feeling giddy right now.
Went out to work,go home,watch tv,sleep, what a bored..
Went out to buy ticket fo his next agenda. cant wait to see him. Lost my handphone but never mind, cant wait to buy a new one.hehehe.

2000-meet up with siti nurhaliza/westmall 19 august 2000-shioklah.com/westmall 2000/2001-Imm/Juara 13 september 2003-courts suntec city 11 jan 2004- Yourthpark 14 feb 2004- bedok library 18 march 2004- expo 17 april 2004- marsiling,malam senandung 8 may 2004- p.gurame 14 may 2004- pesta perdana 2004 5 june 2004- al-falah 10 july 2004- suntec,rock auditorium 28,29 August 2004-Imm,jurong urlLink urlLink
Today,go out with freinds at work.nothing much a just simple dinner and go for the movies,the day for tommorrow. nice and bit scare.

In these past few weeks,my computer broke down,oh my... luckily,its over!Hope so...anyway,he is back,Oh my!what a relief! he's back on 31 may 04, at 0530 am sharp.Do you know that i miss him so much. In meantime,i managed to see him at alfalah mosque at orchard on 5 June.OH MY GOD... My heart beart moving fast..guess what,i fall in love..
Will he be back on national day, 9 aug ?im not certain about it.Maybe not.Doesnt he miss his family for stay away too long? hmmm......anyway,happy birthday singapore. urlLink urlLink urlLink
What happenened to me?since yesterday,i broke a vase now today i broke a watch,just brought.Why? I feel lost.....aargh....or ..... sorry,im so careless.(Miss daddy) urlLink urlLink

A segment for anugerah is starting today.As for him,he will take a role as daddy jarum. What he is going to do is interview a people,participant and judges.Well so far so good.and i miss daddy.......i wonder what he is doing right now,hehehe! urlLink urlLink
urlLink urlLink I am stress........aargh!Why?is it because im thinking too much? urlLink urlLink urlLink

urlLink Yeah, quess what im hoping to see him again next month,hopefully! That is on 28 and 29 aug 04 ...Yes! I heard that event is specially for manja magazine.That means he will coming back next month! urlLink urlLink
Am i dreaming or is that my ilusions?Looks very real to me.....whatever.

He will be going to KL this friday.Since his career is part of his life,i have to accept the fact.Not only that but to accept he is a well known to his fans and i am used to be one of them.Well,that is his job and he only do the best he can.
Why love is torturing my life?it is just like a rollercoaster.....so painful.

The day i met him... he ask me to take care of myself,be good and what am i taking after this,did i come there alone? so many questions....all this while,he never ask me all this, only that day.He seems very concern.When i was about to go home,He told me to take care & be extra careful when going back home cos its already midnight. :)hazrul seems to know about it,he know that i am gonna waiting for him, maybe from his mum.(i already met her at pp7)when i take a photo with him ,he tell us to be closer a bit,how much closer? weird....
Managed to see him yesterday.Do you know i feel yesterday?anxious,excited,nervous and happy of course....and happy to see hazrul nizam & suhailla salam too.
At last.i got new hp on my own,yipee!The modul 6610i.Tomorrow,im going to see him,double joy for me.Yipee...miss him so much...

In these past few days,i keep on dreaming about him,enter in my dreamland,Why? What does it mean?I shall meeting him this saturday but it doesnt mean ......is it i miss him too much or.......i hope he is fine and still carry on his schedule as usual,you know he is busy always,sometimes doesnt care about his health.That makes me worried about him.:)
Another 5 days to go and this wed,i and my sis are going to buy new handphone.Yeah!
another one week to go.I cant wait to see him,miz him so much.Wonder what he is doing now?I hope he is fine and happy,all the best to him.

Yesterday,i was in night shift.There is an old crazy woman who bought a lot of things. she is short of crazy but she has a money in hand.I wonder what had happenned to her.I can tell that she is used to be rich but now.......
Suzairhe n me.. urlLink urlLink At rock auditorium -10 july
